function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Export of infections across regional borders","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Interdependent infection channels at the population level","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reversal of protective effects at the population level","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Possible influence of other health variables, such as specialist density or development of hospital care over the last 5 years, had practically no impact on our results.","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Unclear unobserved positive rate among asymptomatic children","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Tension between rigor and speed may lead to the dissemination of unverified or non-scientific evidence.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"History of epidemics driving housing reforms and urban regeneration","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Adaptation of living spaces for remote work and study","category":"Education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Link between air pollution and the spread of covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Indoor air quality as a strategic concern during covid-19 pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of hvac systems during infectious disease outbreaks","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Developing standardized daylight levels without considering disease transmission risk","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglecting the impact of low relative humidity on disease transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Climatic impact on balcony design","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Emergence of new viral infectious diseases","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of diseases from animal infection","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of covid-19 in restaurant settings","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation leading to misunderstanding of covid-19 transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close contact settings increase the risk of covid-19 transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness or emphasis on the effectiveness of engineering controls for reducing airborne infection risks","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 due to inadequate iaq measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor indoor air quality leading to occupational diseases among health care workers","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The use of uvgi for disinfection may not be effective for covid-19 virus in real-life scenarios risks to individuals if not used properly","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The susceptibility of coronavirus to uv irradiation, while effective, may not eliminate the risk of clinical settings","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Nosocomial transmission and occupational tb in resource-limited settings","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Climate dependency of natural ventilation","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential for transmission of contagious diseases among guinea pigs due to ventilation and ionization of air","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of statistical analysis to compare tb infections between groups","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Nonsignificant trend for uv lights to be more protective than ionizers against tb infection and disease","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reduction in tb infections and disease due to ionizers and uv lights","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Aumento significativo da curva epidemiológica devido à pandemia da covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Concentração das iniciativas de adoção de tecnologia em locais historicamente favoráveis à inovação","category":"Technology","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Adoção de tecnologia digital na otimização dos serviçose segue uma tendência mundial","category":"Technology","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Aumento significativo de la curva epidemiológica en brasilia","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Adopción de curves in the cities, leading to a speed of response driven by the immediacy-led demands of the faced situation.","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Adoption of digital tools by public management may have challenges in implementation and adaptation of activities, particularly in the context of isolation measures.","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Utilizing big data and technology may lead to privacy and data security risks, especially in the context of a pandemic.","category":"Technology","confidence":"High"}]}
